price: 53. Alle waa Kan idiinka dhigay dhulka gogol (fidsan); oo idiinka furay waddooyin dhexdeeda, idiinkana soo dejiya biyo (roob) xagga daruuraha, markaasaan ku soo saarnaa dhir noocyo kala duwan ah.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّن نَّبَاتٖ شَتَّىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa mahdan wasalaka lakum fīhā subulan wa-anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-akhrajnā bihi azwājan min nabātin shattā
